name: BitPowr Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a blockchain infrastructure platform intended for businesses and developers to build and scale crypto and fintech products. The company's platform provides a modular ecosystem of critical blockchain and web3 infrastructure for businesses to build blockchain-powered products, enabling businesses and developers to a blockchain and digital assets infrastructure.
one_liner: Developer of a blockchain infrastructure platform intended for businesses and developers to build and scale crypto and fintech products. The company's platform provides a modular ecosystem of critical blockchain and web3 infrastructure for businesses to build blockchain-powered products, enabling businesses and developers to a blockchain and digital assets infrastructure.
